hints.content:
$960 -{\goldE{?}}= 581$

![A number line with 2 points labeled. An arrow from point 960 back to point 581 is labeled, minus question mark.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/39a4776ff268f260f00a1c4cd15c48d87888e133)

Let's start by subtracting hundreds from ${960}$ until we get as close to  ${581}$ as possible without going below ${581}$.

$\begin{align}
{960} -\purpleD{100}=860\\\\
{860} -\purpleD{100}= 760\\\\
{760} -\purpleD{100}= 660
\end{align}$

If we subtract $\purpleD{3 \text{ hundreds}}$, or $\purpleD{3 00}$, we reach $660$. We cannot subtract any more hundreds without going below ${581}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 960 back to a new point 660 labeled, "minus 300"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b08ddf038a90675ae35aee0606341df3e9ebee81)

Next, let's subtract tens from $660$ until we get as close to  ${581}$ as possible without going below ${581}$.

$\begin{align}
660 -\blueD{10}=650\\\\
{650} -\blueD{10}= 640\\\\
{640} -\blueD{10}= 630\\\\
{630} -\blueD{10}= 620\\\\
{620} -\blueD{10}= 610\\\\
{610} -\blueD{10}= 600\\\\
{600} -\blueD{10}= 590
\end{align}$

If we subtract $\blueD{7 \text{ tens}}$, or $\blueD{70}$, we reach $590$. We cannot subtract any more tens without going below ${581}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 660 back to a new point 590 labeled, "minus 70"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/fccff3e3a544e66df01de40c636fb18d71e7e7e5)

Finally, how many ones should we subtract from $590$ to get to  ${581}?$

$590 -\greenD{9}={581}$

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 590 back to point 581 labeled, "minus 9"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1386772c0dfa02a4e203cec1d3a2a67aa3f870fa)

We subtracted $\purpleD{3 \text{ hundreds}}$, $\blueD{7 \text{ tens}}$, and $\greenD{9\text{ ones}}$ from ${960}$ to get to ${581}$.

$\purpleD{3 00}+\blueD{7 0}+\greenD{9}=\goldE{379}$

![The number line with all of the arrows shown. The original arrow from point 960 to point 581 is labeled, "minus 379." The arrows spans the arrows labeled "minus 300," "minus 70," and "minus 9."](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4114a7b4a5000695e0cc4f08bdc2a38cc38597f2)
